name: Unseen Ambusher
description: While in Combat, you have ADV on Stealth checks. Furthermore, if you are hidden from a creature, that creature has DIS on its Save against your Debilitating Strike.

name: Sinister Shot
description: Your *Cheap Shot* deals +1 damage for each additional Condition on the target. If a Condition has levels (X), each level of the Condition counts as an additional Condition. \\nIf a Condition states thats that you are also considered to have other conditions (Ex: When *Restrained* you are also considered to be *Hindered*), you do not gain additional damage for the **considered to have** Condition it lists.
